hero.headline: Replace platform bloat with capability-driven execution
hero.subheadline: We help enterprises decouple overbuilt systems and stand up modular platforms that restore control without forcing another all-or-nothing replatform.

pillars: Lead with capabilities, not vendor roadmaps
Protect systems of record while you modernize around them
Move in controlled increments that executives can govern
whatYouGet: A plain-language view of where work sits outside the system and why it spreads
A capability map that defines ownership, decisions, and control points before tooling decisions
A sequenced plan to replace or decouple the riskiest capabilities without destabilizing finance or operations
Evidence-based cutover criteria so leadership can approve change with confidence, not hope
A platform posture that stays adaptable as strategy, structure, and systems evolve

deliverables.title: Capability control map
deliverables.description: A cross-functional view of the capabilities that run the business, the systems that support them, and where control leaks.

deliverables.title: Stabilization plan
deliverables.description: Targeted interventions that stop spreadsheet sprawl, patch brittle handoffs, and reduce operational noise while deeper changes are sequenced.

deliverables.title: Replacement sequence
deliverables.description: A leadership-ready plan that shows what is decoupled or replaced first, how risk is contained, and what proof is required to move forward.

deliverables.title: Cutover governance pack
deliverables.description: Decision checkpoints, approval criteria, rollback rules, and evidence expectations that keep platform change inside executive control.

deliverables.title: Optionality roadmap
deliverables.description: A practical path to evolve capability by capability so you are never forced back into a single-vendor, single-decision posture.
